snippet: President Thein Sein signed a clemency order on Monday in observance of the nation’s 64th anniversary of independence, but activists said the move fell short of promises.
abstract: Pres Thein Sein of Myanmar signs clemency order releasing prisoners on 64th anniversary of country's independence; activists say order, which does not release political prisoners, falls short of promises.
lead_paragraph: President Thein Sein signed a clemency order on Monday in observance of the nation’s 64th anniversary of independence, but activists said the move fell short of promises.
